All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CheckersApp
Class for creating the checkers board, connecting to server, handling server response and updating gui
CheckersBoard
Interface for the each board
CheckersMenu
Class opening the application menu and initializing whole app
CheckersServer
Class initializing the server which listens on specific port and waits for 2 clients to connect Class for creating the game object with 2 connected to server clients and starting the thread for this class
ClassicBoard
 
ClassicGameRules
 
Game
Server Class for sending the response to the clients
GameRules
Interface with the methods that server is checking
Piece
Piece class which creates the piece
PieceType
Enum defining the color of the piece
PolishBoard
Class for creating board of polish version, sending msg to server about size and rules
RussianBoard
 
RussianGameRules
Class including methods specifying rules of the russian checkers
Square
Square class crating the rectangles
